meanings.definition: Having a surface that is smooth and causes slipping.
meanings.sent1: The ice rink was the slippiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The marble floor was the slippiest surface I had ever walked on.
meanings.sent3: The slippiest part of the playground was the slide, making it extra fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: After the rain, the road became the slippiest path to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The slippiest section of the trail was covered in moss, making it treacherous to cross.

meanings.sent1: The slippiest shoes I own are the ones with worn-out soles.
meanings.sent2: The slippiest slope on the hill made sledding a thrilling experience.
meanings.sent3: The slippiest banana peel caused a hilarious fall in the comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The slippiest spot on the dance floor led to some unexpected moves.
meanings.sent5: The slippiest section of the track made the race more challenging for the runners.
